THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS 8 O BROAD STREET NEW YORK 4, N. Y.
FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, NEW YORK
本件品存
+
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
May 26, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4
Subject: Excess Equipment
Project No, 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Chang:
The enclosed list of excess equipment can be utilized by Taiwan Power Company/BD.
We suggest that necessary action be taken to procure this item for TPC's use. 許耀爾
For your convenience also enclosed is the pertinent catalogue information.
Very truly yours, THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION
Che Wan king Chas. G. Van Ness, Jr. Assistant Project Manager
